description: This is an entry point JavaScript file for a React web application. It initializes the React app by mounting the App component into the DOM.

methods.name: ReactDOM.createRoot
methods.description: Creates a root to render React components in the specified DOM element.

methods.name: React.StrictMode
methods.description: A React component that activates additional checks and warnings for its children.

methods.name: root.render
methods.description: Method to render React components into the root container.
